title: I have not received the Pixel 5 phone I ordered
content:
I did not receive a Pixel 5 phone I ordered that was supposed to arrive "Oct 29-30". Tracking info through Canada Post is invalid and shows "Multiple Pin". I tried to chat with Google support to know where the package is (or to get a delivery estimate), and they hung up on me twice (once I didn't even get to say "hi"). Very rude. I tried calling but cannot talk to a human "because of COVID". Overall a terrible buying experience.

How do you get support from Google?
